Package org.apache.calcite.plan

Class ConventionTraitDef

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.calcite.plan.RelTraitDef<Convention>
      • org.apache.calcite.plan.ConventionTraitDef
  • public class ConventionTraitDef
extends RelTraitDef<Convention>
    Definition of the the convention trait. A new set of conversion information is created for each planner that registers at least one ConverterRule instance.

    Conversion data is held in a LoadingCache with weak keys so that the JVM's garbage collector may reclaim the conversion data after the planner itself has been garbage collected. The conversion information consists of a graph of conversions (from one calling convention to another) and a map of graph arcs to ConverterRules.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      private static class  ConventionTraitDef.ConversionData
      Workspace for converting from one convention to another.

      • conversionCache

        private final com.google.common.cache.LoadingCache<RelOptPlanner,​ConventionTraitDef.ConversionData> conversionCache
        Weak-key cache of RelOptPlanner to ConversionData. The idea is that when the planner goes away, so does the cache entry.
